item.title: Installing generator
item.dc:creator: troyh
item.content:encoded: After a 6-day electrical outage last December we decided to get a fat generator to power the entire house for 2-3 days at a time. The "Onan":http://www.cumminsonan.com/ 30,000kW genset was delivered early summer and we're _finally_ getting it installed. This week we had a concrete pad built and today we had the generator placed on it. http://www.youtube.com/v/9Cgw1_DLYko Next is the electrical work and getting a propane tank installed to power it.
